name: Wind's Harp
description: The Wind's Harp is a Medium-sized evil fiend known for its cunning and malicious influence. It possesses an exceptional Charisma score, enhancing its spellcasting abilities.
memorable: Its ability to disrupt spellcasting with Diabolical Countersong makes it a formidable foe.
goals: The Wind's Harp aims to manipulate and disrupt enemies using its magical abilities.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other fiends or air-based creatures.
environment: Often found in areas of magical influence or locations with chaotic energies.
strengths: Resistance to spells and immunity to cold, fire, and poison damage provide exceptional durability.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class makes it vulnerable to physical attacks.
attacks: Performs ranged attacks known as Infernal Noise dealing psychic and thunder damage.
most_powerful_ability: Hellish Chorus, creating an infernal cacophony that damages all nearby creatures.
skills: Skilled in stealth, allowing it to remain undetected effectively.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
False Appearance allows it to ambush unsuspecting foes.
Strong Winds ability enhances attack rolls in conjunction with air allies.
Immunities to cold, fire, and poison damage highlight its resilience.
Ability to deal psychic damage aligns with its malevolent nature.
test_queries: medium fiend that can interrupt spells
manipulative fiend with powerful ranged attacks
cunning creature that uses infernal noise
fiend immune to fire and poison
